Class PloyBoard

java.lang.Object

public class PloyBoard extends Board

    • rotatePiece

      public void rotatePiece(int x, int y, int direction)
      Rotates a piece. Direction = -45 turns the piece left, direction = 45 turns it right.
      Parameters:
      x - location on the x axis of the board
      y - location on the y axis of the board
      direction - the new direction the piece will face
